title: Comfort Knitting & Crochet- Afghans [PDF] [StormRG]

And whether youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re making one for yourself, as a housewarming gift, or to welcome a new baby into the world, the process of creating a handmade afghan can be as rewarding as the finished product.

Comfort Knitting and Crochet: Afghans features 50 patterns for these cozy blankets, made with Berroco Comfort yarnÃ¢â‚¬â€an affordable, ultra-soft acrylic/nylon blendÃ¢â‚¬â€and designed by the Berroco team, headed by Norah Gaughan. Intended for knitters and crocheters of every skill level, this collection brings new life to the well-loved and versatile afghan
